modName: Bbbbilly's Pile - Pile Search Will Not Be Destroyed
modShortDescription: This simple and practical mod is suitable for players who like to search resources repeatedly. It can also be applied to the server.
modDescription:
This simple and practical mod is suitable for players who like to search resources repeatedly.

**Effect:** Whether it’s food pile, ammunition pile or medicine pile, they won’t be destroyed after you search.

It can also be applied to the server. Have a good time.

**Inspired by:** JaxTeller718’s [Trash Piles Destroy on Loot](https://7daystodiemods.com/trash-piles-destroy-on-loot/)

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1pHYnlxF3vcXnwghmZR6YSyCT3e6gkZ-x)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/23293-a19bbbbillys-pile%E2%80%94%E2%80%94pile-search-will-not-be-destroyed/).

**Credits:** [BBBBilly](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/bbbbilly/)
